snippet: The authorities in Wardak Province said they had reports that a dozen officers had been kidnapped by insurgents while traveling to Kabul to collect their salaries.
abstract: Insurgents kidnap group of Afghan policemen traveling in civilian clothes from Wardak Province to Kabul to collect their salaries, and Taliban later claims that they killed seven of them.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed reported from Maidan Wardak, and Rod Nordland from Kabul, Afghanistan. Habib Zahori contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The authorities in Wardak Province said they had reports that a dozen officers had been kidnapped by insurgents while traveling to Kabul to collect their salaries.

headline.main: Taliban Say They Killed 7 Afghan Police Officers
headline.print_headline: Taliban Say They Killed 7 Afghan Police Officers
